import React from "react"; function DiscussionForum() { return (

Discussion Forum

Welcome to our discussion forum! Here, you can connect with other members and experts to ask questions, share knowledge, and engage in lively discussions on a variety of topics. Our forum features live chat sessions where you can get instant answers and advice, as well as forum posts where you can explore a wide range of topics posted by the community. Whether you're looking for advice, want to share your expertise, or simply enjoy connecting with like-minded individuals, our discussion forum is the perfect place to be. Join us today and start participating in the conversation!

{/* {questions.map((question, index) => (

{question.question}

))} */}
); } export default DiscussionForum;
